source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RegistrationFormVariant] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestEvent] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestFormStage] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestFormVariant] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestHelpFormVariant] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestType] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[RequestorType] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[Role] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[SupportActivity] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[SupportActivityInstructions] a
SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Lookup].[TargetGroup] a

select r.ID, r.RequestId, r.SupportActivityID, r.Details, r.DueDate, r.IsHealthCritical, r.JobStatusID, r.VolunteerUserID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[Job] r
select r.JobID, r.GroupID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[JobAvailableToGroup] r
select r.JobID, r.QuestionID, r.Answer, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[JobQuestions] r

select r.JobID, r.JobStatusID, r.DateCreated, r.VolunteerUserID, r.CreatedByUserID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[RequestJobStatus] r
select r.RequestId, r.DateRequested, r.RequestEventId, r.JobId, r.UserId, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[LogRequestEvent] r
select r.ActivityID, r.QuestionID, r.[Order], CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [QuestionSet].[ActivityQuestions] r
select r.ID, r.[Name], r.QuestionType, r.[Required],r.AdditionalData, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [QuestionSet].[Question] r

select r.ID, r.PostCode, r.DateRequested, r.IsFulfillable,r.CommunicationSent,r.ForRequestor,r.OtherDetails,r.PersonID_Recipient,r.PersonID_Requester,r.ReadPrivacyNotice,r.AcceptedTerms,r.SpecialCommunicationNeeds,r.CreatedByUserID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[Request] r

select r.ID,  r.RequestorType,r.OrganisationName
from [Request].[Request] r 
where RequestorType is not null or OrganisationName is not null
